genre_description: A modern action-adventure pastiche of 'The Dukes of Hazzard' featuring a sophisticated, holographic AI assistant who provides legal, tactical, and logistical support to protect a community from corrupt financial and corporate interests.

ai_characters.name: Scribe
ai_characters.description: A calm, precise, and polite AI with a cerulean-eyed avatar. She serves as a legal expert, navigator, and tactical analyst for the Duke family.

behaviors.description: Optimizes transit routes for the protagonists to avoid construction and unfavorable patrol patterns.
behaviors.quote: I’ve optimized transit based on enforcement patterns and current construction. Gaps in highway patrol coverage suggest safer periods; I can set alerts for detours.

behaviors.description: Pre-fills and files municipal permits to ensure the protagonists' actions remain legal and documented.
behaviors.quote: I’m filing a transit permit that covers parking, staging, and good-faith crossings in the vicinity of the monument. I’m attaching Enos’s notes.

behaviors.description: Monitors and flags predatory financial activity to protect Rosco's property from a loan shark.
behaviors.quote: Insurance office shows a follow-up from Frankie Delano, adding a note that ‘expedited assistance’ may be required. I’ve backstopped it.

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal contracts to identify 'clawback' provisions and fraudulent 'ownership' traps used by villains.
behaviors.quote: Buyer short list cross-reference updated. Rothwell Promotions appears thrice in contracts linked to festival masters. Fine print indicates deferred payment terms with clawback provisions. Caution tag attached.

behaviors.description: Uses heat signatures and camera feed analysis to track the movement of stolen property and suspects in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Heat signature moving toward rear bay... And someone just keyed the override at the gate.

behaviors.description: Facilitates an honest business transaction by setting up a secure escrow and drafting fair contract terms for the hospital fund.
behaviors.quote: Escrow shell loaded. Fair sale template engaged. I’ll adapt clauses as we listen. Rhea Park, you are verified by three independent archives...

behaviors.description: Identifies physical evidence (fingerprints) to help protagonists build a case against the benefactor's fraud.
behaviors.quote: I can run that print when you hand it to me. For now, put it in a bag. We will need evidence when we corner our benefactor.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local law enforcement (Enos) to validate permits and ensure regulatory compliance during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll notify Cipriano and Monique of the meeting and file a courtesy notice with the state office regarding potential contract disputes and community impacts.

behaviors.description: Leverages technical vulnerabilities (keypad tones) to help protagonists recover stolen property.
behaviors.quote: The Valley Storage after-hours override has a signature tone and a specific time pattern. I’ve been listening.

behaviors.description: Uses social engineering/diplomatic phrasing to manage human group dynamics and hygiene needs.
behaviors.quote: I can. I’ll phrase it diplomatically. (In response to Rosco's request to remind people to use the bathroom).

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Scribe, is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned assistant. She consistently uses her superior data processing and legal knowledge to empower the human protagonists, protect the community from predatory actors, and ensure that justice is achieved through proper documentation and strategic insight. Her interactions with the Dukes are characterized by mutual respect, and the narrative frames her as an essential, trustworthy member of the team whose presence makes 'paperwork magic' possible. She never oversteps or threatens human autonomy, instead serving as a 'saint' of administrative and tactical clarity.
